content: आयतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Length, extension. {@--2@} Future time, the future; °भंग <ls>K. 55</ls> (length also), <ls n="K.">58</ls>, <ls>Dk. 29</ls>; भूयसी तव यदायतायतिः <ls>Śi. 14. 5</ls>; रहयत्यापदुपेतमायतिः <ls>Ki. 2. 14</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 169</ls>; अनायति क्षमं वचः <ls>Pt. 3. 112</ls> imprudent, not good for the future; °ग्लानिभूतः <ls>Mu. 4. 12</ls>; स्थिर° <ls>Ki. 1. 23</ls>, permanent. {@--3@} Future consequence or result; आयतिं सर्वकार्याणां तदात्वं च विचारयेत् <ls>Ms. 7. 178</ls>; <ls>Ki. 1. 15</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">2. 43</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">3. 43</ls>; <ls>Ki. 4. 21</ls> fruit-yielding season. {@--4@} Majesty, dignity. {@--5@} Stretching the hand, accepting, obtaining. {@--6@} Work (कर्मन्); यथा मित्रं ध्रुवं लब्ध्वा कृशमप्यायतिक्षमं <ls>Ms. 7. 208</ls> (कर्मक्षमं <ls>Kull.</ls>). {@--7@} Connection, junction. {@--8@} Meeting, union. {@--9@} Source, descent; तदायतिः <ls>Dk. 154</ls> descended from him. {@--10@} Restraint (of mind).
